elements.text: When you establish a false identity, roll +shadow. On a strong hit, you may add +2 when you make moves using this identity to deceive or influence others. If you roll a 1 on your action die when using your false identity, someone doubts you. Make appropriate moves to reassure them or prevent them from revealing the truth. On a weak hit, as above, but add +1 (instead of +2).
As above, and you may roll +shadow (instead of +heart) when you Sojourn under your false identity. If you do, take +1 momentum on a hit.
When you Secure an Advantage by revealing your true identity in a dramatic moment, reroll any dice.
